instance.advanced.cloudflare.manage.label: Status:

instance.advanced.cloudflare.cache.subtitle: Clear cached files to force Cloudflare to fetch a fresh version of those files from your web server.

instance.advanced.cloudflare.development.title: Development Mode
instance.advanced.cloudflare.development.subtitle: Temporarily bypass our cache allowing you to see changes to your origin server in real time.
instance.advanced.cloudflare.development.alert: Enabling this feature can significantly increase origin sever load. Development mode does not purge the cache so files will need to be purged after development mode expires.

instance.ssl.selfSigned: Self-signed SSL is active for this domain, but it is not trusted by the browsers.
instance.ssl.secured: Domain is now secured by a trusted SSL provider.
instance.ssl.enabled: SSL is enabled for this domain.
instance.siteDetails.security.loadingSpeed.noData: The data becomes available within up to 24 hours after the instance is created. If you have been waiting longer, it may be caused by incorrectly configured DNS or firewall.
If you don't see any data, please contact admin.
instance.plugin.update.current: This plugin is up to date.
instance.theme.update.current: This theme has no available updates.
instance.theme.updated: The theme has already been updated
instance.user.field.username: Enter the username that will be visible as Display Name of the new user.
instance.user.field.email: Enter the email address that will be assigned to the new user.
instance.user.field.displayName: Enter the display name for the new user.
instance.user.field.password: Enter the password for the new user.
instance.user.field.role: Assign roles to the new user.
instance.pushToLive.structuralChangeTables: Modify the structure of a database table.
instance.pushToLive.dataChangeTables: Modify the data of a database tables.
instance.sharedAccess.role.viewOnly: Providing access only to the website details without any control or WP Admin access.
instance.sharedAccess.role.viewAndSso: 'Allowing to display website details and use the "WP Admin" option to log in to WordPress as an administrator.
instance.sharedAccess.role.developer: Providing access to all management options for your website without access to the hosting instance management.
instance.sharedAccess.role.fullAccess: Providing access to all management options for your website as well as the related hosting instance. Please note that if this hosting instance comes with other sites too, they will have access to them as well.

hosting.summary.nameservers.notResolve: Cannot resolve nameservers of some of your domains.
hosting.summary.dns.notResolve: Cannot resolve DNS of some of your domains.
hosting.summary.nameservers.notPointed: Some of your domains are not pointed to our nameservers.
hosting.domains.nameserversChecker.notResolved: Nameservers for this domain could not be resolved. Please set the following nameservers to connect with our servers.
hosting.domains.nameserversChecker.notPointed: This domain is not pointing correctly to our nameservers. Please set the following nameservers to connect with our servers.
hosting.dns.status.failed: The SSL certificate installation for {domain} has failed. Please contact support.
hosting.dns.status.awaiting: The SSL certificate has been generated for {domain} and it awaits correct DNS settings for the domain.
hosting.dns.status.pending.alert: The SSL certificate is being generated for {domain}
hosting.dns.status.pending.list.first: The system will update status as soon as the certificate is successfully installed.
hosting.dns.status.pending.list.second: Please make sure that during the process the domain DNS is pointing correctly to our servers.
hosting.dns.status.pending.list.third: If certificate is not installed automatically within 24 hours, please contact support.
hosting.ftp.usageNotSupported: Usage and quota is unsupported by server.
